text: Antonia Noori Farzan is an American journalist. She is a reporter for the Washington Post. She won a 2017 George Polk Award. She studied at Hamilton College and Columbia University. She worked at Business Insider and Phoenix New Times. Her work appeared in The Independent. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * * Category:American journalists Category:George Polk Award winners Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Columbia University alumni
title: Antonia Farzan
